mapper.sql: ID, MAINID, BJXLH, BJH, ZWMS, YWMS, GG, XH, BJBS, BZ, JY_SCRQ, JY_XCRQ, JY_ZQ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ

BW00101.ID, BW00101.MAINID, BW00101.BJXLH, BW00101.BJH, BW00101.ZWMS, BW00101.YWMS, BW00101.GG, BW00101.XH, BW00101.BJBS, BW00101.BZ, BW00101.JY_SCRQ, BW00101.JY_XCRQ, BW00101.JY_ZQ, BW00101.ZT, BW00101.WHBMID, BW00101.WHRID, BW00101.WHSJ
mapper.select: SELECT T1.ID, T1.MAINID, T1.BJXLH, T1.BJH, (CASE WHEN T3.ZWMS IS NULL THEN T1.ZWMS ELSE T3.ZWMS END) ZWMS, (CASE WHEN T3.YWMS IS NULL THEN T1.YWMS ELSE T3.YWMS END) YWMS, (CASE WHEN T3.GG IS NULL THEN T1.GG ELSE T3.GG END) GG, (CASE WHEN T3.XINGH IS NULL THEN T1.XH ELSE T3.XINGH END) XH, T1.BJBS, T1.BZ, T1.JY_SCRQ, T1.JY_XCRQ, T1.JY_ZQ, T1.ZT, T1.WHBMID, T1.WHRID, T1.WHSJ FROM B_W_00101 T1 JOIN B_W_001 T2 ON T1.MAINID = T2.ID LEFT JOIN D_008 T3 ON T2.BJID = T3.ID WHERE T1.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.ID, t.JY_SCRQ FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MAINID, BJXLH ORDER BY JY_SCRQ DESC) rn, ID, JY_SCRQ FROM B_W_00101 WHERE ZT = 1 and MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BJXLH = #{bjxlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t WHERE t.rn = 1

SELECT BW00101.ID, BW00101.MAINID, BW00101.BJXLH, BW00101.BJH, (CASE WHEN BW00101.ZWMS IS NULL THEN T3.ZWMS ELSE BW00101.ZWMS END) ZWMS, (CASE WHEN BW00101.YWMS IS NULL THEN T3.YWMS ELSE BW00101.YWMS END) YWMS, (CASE WHEN BW00101.GG IS NULL THEN T3.GG ELSE BW00101.GG END) GG, (CASE WHEN BW00101.XH IS NULL THEN T3.XINGH ELSE BW00101.XH END) XH, BW00101.BJBS, BW00101.BZ, BW00101.JY_SCRQ, BW00101.JY_XCRQ, BW00101.JY_ZQ, BW00101.ZT, BW00101.WHBMID, BW00101.WHRID, BW00101.WHSJ FROM B_W_00101 BW00101 JOIN (SELECT BJXLH, MAX(JY_SCRQ) AS JY_SCRQ FROM B_W_00101 WHERE MAINID = #{mainid} AND ZT = 1 GROUP BY BJXLH) A ON BW00101.BJXLH = A.BJXLH AND BW00101.JY_SCRQ = A.JY_SCRQ JOIN B_W_001 T2 ON BW00101.MAINID = T2.ID LEFT JOIN D_008 T3 ON T2.BJID = T3.ID WHERE BW00101.MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BW00101.ZT = 1 ORDER BY BW00101.BJBS DESC, BW00101.JY_SCRQ DESC

SELECT BW00101.ID, BW00101.MAINID, BW00101.BJXLH, BW00101.BJH, (CASE WHEN BW00101.ZWMS IS NULL THEN T3.ZWMS ELSE BW00101.ZWMS END) ZWMS, (CASE WHEN BW00101.YWMS IS NULL THEN T3.YWMS ELSE BW00101.YWMS END) YWMS, (CASE WHEN BW00101.GG IS NULL THEN T3.GG ELSE BW00101.GG END) GG, (CASE WHEN BW00101.XH IS NULL THEN T3.XINGH ELSE BW00101.XH END) XH, BW00101.BJBS, BW00101.BZ, BW00101.JY_SCRQ, BW00101.JY_XCRQ, BW00101.JY_ZQ, BW00101.ZT, BW00101.WHBMID, BW00101.WHRID, BW00101.WHSJ, UW.ID AS WID, UW.USERNAME AS WUSERNAME, UW.REALNAME AS WREALNAME FROM B_W_00101 BW00101 LEFT JOIN T_USER UW ON BW00101.WHRID = UW.ID JOIN B_W_001 T2 ON BW00101.MAINID = T2.ID LEFT JOIN D_008 T3 ON T2.BJID = T3.ID WHERE BW00101.MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BW00101.ZT = 1 AND BW00101.BJXLH = #{bjxlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY BW00101.JY_SCRQ DESC
mapper.insert: insert into B_W_00101 (ID, MAINID, BJXLH, BJH, ZWMS, YWMS, GG, XH, BJBS, BZ, JY_SCRQ, JY_XCRQ, JY_ZQ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjxlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyScrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jyXcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jyZq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update B_W_00101
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJXLH = #{bjxlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWMS = #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GG = #{gg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XH = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJBS = #{bjbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JY_SCRQ = #{jyScrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JY_XCRQ = #{jyXcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JY_ZQ = #{jyZq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = current_timestamp,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update B_W_00101 set ZT = 0 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_W_00101 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJXLH = #{bjxlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWMS = #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GG = #{gg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XH = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJBS = #{bjbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JY_SCRQ = #{jyScrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JY_XCRQ = #{jyXcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JY_ZQ = #{jyZq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
